scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/img && cp -r src/img/* dist/img/ && mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -r src/fonts/* dist/fonts/ && mkdir -p dist/js && cp -r src/js/* dist/js/
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run convert-images && sass src/scss:dist/css --style compressed && npm run update-html
scripts.start: npm run copy-assets && npm run sass:watch
